verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani] [V: declared] [ARG1: Robert Mueller would wrap up his investigation on Donald Trump ’s high crimes and misdemeanors by September 1] , the knee - jerk reaction from most everyone , myself included , was : How could Giuliani possibly know that ?
